thread.section_title: Avis marchands de Euroflorist Belgique / België | Avis - Euroflorist Belgique / België | www.euroflorist.be | 6 sur 228
thread.title: Jayakumar Subramaniam
thread.title_full: Euroflorist Belgique / België évalué par Jayakumar Subramaniam

author: Jayakumar Subramaniam
title: Jayakumar Subramaniam
text:
This is my first order with euroflorist and also form same day delivery, the euroflorist excellently handled the order as obliged..and on agreed timeline... The leafs along with tulip flower was little dry and other than that every thing was as expected and good.
Pricing is on little higher side
Tried couple of discount code, but not successful
Card message is possible only using Latin font, I tried for this sometime and not successful and so not ordered the card
